DataElement.preferredName: Patient First Line Therapy Last Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to the last dose of the initial treatment for cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient First-Line Therapy Last Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures._The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Concepts.definition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Property.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Last Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: The last dose of first-line c
ReferenceDocuments.description: The last dose of first-line chemotherapy must have been received no less than 3 weeks, and no more than 10 weeks, prior to randomization in the present study.
